description:
When people in Richmond Hill, Georgia, need legal representation in criminal defense or civil matters, it is important to choose an attorney they can trust. Arnold & Stafford, Attorneys at Law, has more than six decades of legal experience, and 40 years of military experience. Our staff handles misdemeanor and felony charges, personal injury, real estate, military law, family law and estate planning matters. We also regularly represent people in Hinesville, Ludowici and the coastal region of the state, and we are licensed in Georgia, Florida, Iowa, California and Hawaii.

Our criminal defense staff is available 24 hours a day, seven days a week, for your convenience. During our free initial consultation, we sit down with you, listen to your legal matter, hear your concerns and questions, provide answers to those questions, and then ask our own questions to gain a clear understanding of your situation. Our law firm knows that your case is unique from the other cases we handle and we are dedicated to creating a legal strategy that works with your needs and goals.

Throughout your case, Arnold & Stafford, Attorneys at Law, is there to help you through the legal system. We'll explain to you how legal processes work, assist you in gathering evidence to prove your innocence or civil claim, and vigorously represent your rights in court if a settlement or negotiation is not in your best interests.
